messages.title: Let’s change Britain’s future
messages.content: No coalitions, no pacts. Vote Lib Dem, get Lib Dem.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Thomas would push to introduce Lib Dem policies such as increasing funding for local councils for homelessness prevention, and reinstating housing benefits for under-21s.
Southampton’s air pollution is at dangerous levels. Thomas and the Lib Dems would invest in green transport such as electric vehicles and phase out diesel.
Thomas is committed to representing the young people of Southampton in parliament and will fight for a good deal for Britain’s youth and students.
Thomas and the Lib Dems are demanding a referendum on the final deal of Brexit negotiations.
1p on Income Tax to raise £6bn a year for the NHS.
Maintain triple lock on pension rises.

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting a Hard Brexit - Thomas and the Lib Dems are demanding a referendum on the final deal of Brexit negotiations. They believe that the people, not politicians, must get the final say.
issues.environment: Southampton’s air pollution is at dangerous levels. Thomas and the Lib Dems would invest in green transport such as electric vehicles and phase out diesel.

examples: Theresa May will keep cutting pensions, schools and the NHS.
“Hospital cuts planned in most of England” - BBC, 7 February 2017
“Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years” - Mirror, 17 March 2017
Theresa May’s heartless cuts to pensions, schools and our NHS with the Conservatives.
